topic.title: The Cellar
topic.shortdesc: The next stop is the Cellar, a great restaurant and bar to hang out with friends

li.p: The Cellar has always been one of my favorite restaurants in Blacksburg, and now that I'm able to drink legally it's one of my favorite bars
You can sit inside or outside, as well as upstairs or downstairs. My personal favorite is sitting down in the bottom
Next to the restaurant is the Six Pack Store, where you can buy a variety of beers to take the party home with you
For food, my favorites to get are the Cajun shrimp dip and the Barbecue chicken calzone
For drinks, my friends and I always get pitchers of the cheapest beer they have, usually Pabst Blue Ribbon or Miller Lite
